channel.title: Some1 has an idea how to do it?
channel.description:
Okey so i have 2 questions :
1) About my drygores I have been adding drygores (rapier, mace and longsword) but there is no offhand, is there a way i can change some things to make an offhand drygore?
2) About custom items So i've added some customs for ex. Death cape. Atm it gives me the problem that when i spin around (the emote) the cloak just stays there. Its like not connected to my character.
If you have any idea's or wanna have a look on team viewer, feel free to add me on skype : nielskeeeeeeeen.

item.title: Some1 has an idea how to do it?
item.dc:creator: @iisayboom iisayboom
item.description:
@iisayboom wrote:

Is there any1 possibility you would accept to show/learn me on 1 item? Like by using team viewer or so?

Also doesn’t the offhand drygore turns to the ground and acts like a shield? I don’t think the offhand drygore hits aswell right?

Read full topic
item.source: Some1 has an idea how to do it?

item.title: Some1 has an idea how to do it?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

  1. You would have to open the model in a program like metasequoia and move it so it’s in the other hand.

  2. You need to animate the cape.

Read full topic
item.source: Some1 has an idea how to do it?
